db:abstract.db:para: Provides notifications when sensor-based gestures are detected.
This type was introduced in QtSensors 5.0.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: This type provides notification when sensor gestures are triggered.
The following QML code creates a "shake" and "SecondCounter" SensorGesture QML type, and displays the detected gesture in a text type.
QtSensors.shake gesture is available with the Qt Sensors API, but the QtSensors.SecondCounter sensor gesture is provided as example code for the Qt Sensors - SensorGesture QML Type example
Qt Sensor Gestures contains a list of currently supported sensor gestures and their descriptions.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] availableGestures : stringlist
db:section.db:para: This property can be used to determine all available gestures on the system.

db:section.db:title: enabled : bool
db:section.db:para: This property can be used to activate or deactivate the sensor gesture. Default value is false;

db:section.db:title: gestures : stringlist
db:section.db:para: Set this property to a list of the gestures that the application is interested in detecting. This property cannot be changed while the type is enabled.
The properties validGestures and invalidGestures will be set as appropriate immediately. To determine all available getures on the system please use the availableGestures property.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] invalidGestures : stringlist
db:section.db:para: This property holds the requested gestures that were not found on the system.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] validGestures : stringlist
db:section.db:para: This property holds the requested gestures that were found on the system.

db:section.db:title: detected(string gesture)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted whenever a gesture is detected. The gesture parameter contains the gesture that was detected.
